entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 21.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
